note.p: Education: Westminster School; Trinity College, Cambridge; BA (1706), MA (1709)
Career: Fellow of Trinity (1708); ordained deacon (1708); Second Master of Westminster School (1711-1714)
[Musgrave describes him as 'Extra Commissioner of the Navy' and gives date of election but no date of death]
References: K Theodore Hoppen, 'The Royal Society and Ireland. II' in NR 1965 vol 20 pp 78-99
